com.k2.JavaFactory

Class JavaAssembly<W extends com.k2.Wiget.Wiget,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Wiget.WigetAssembly<JavaFamily,java.io.PrintWriter,W,T>
      • com.k2.JavaFactory.JavaAssembly<W,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    W - The type of the root wiget in the assembly
    T - The required type of the root wiget in the assembly

    public class JavaAssembly<W extends com.k2.Wiget.Wiget,T>
extends com.k2.Wiget.WigetAssembly<JavaFamily,java.io.PrintWriter,W,T>
    The template assembly that is used to assemble template wigets The indentation functionality is additional to the functionality required by the raw wiget assembly and are used by all java wigets
    Author:
    simon

      Constructors

      JavaAssembly(com.k2.Wiget.WigetFactory<JavaFamily,java.io.PrintWriter> factory, java.lang.Class<W> wigetType)
      Create a java assembly for the given factory and root wiget type, using an indent string of '\t'

      • getDependencies

        public java.util.Set<com.k2.Util.classes.Dependency> getDependencies()
        Returns:
